text.div:
This code system http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Examples/CodeSystem/JP_MedicationAdministrationDosageRateComment_CS defines many codes, of which the following are a subset:

CodeDisplay
01 １時間一定速度で
02 ２時間一定速度で
03 ３時間一定速度で
04 ４時間一定速度で
05 ５時間一定速度で
10 倍速で実施

name: JP_MedicationExampleRateComment_CS
title: JP Core Medication Example RateComment CodeSystem
